Prebon knew that the odds were in his favor, most of the Alliance was 
at the CF so there was a good chance of victory. "My troops fell 
because they didn't listen to logic." The three he was fighting were 
a fair team. Shots ricochet off his armor as he gained speed in his 
attempt to keep up with Fenox. out of the corner of his optics he saw 
charges coming his way. the first of which caught him off gaurd 
exploding and forceing him to change direction.he grabbed the second 
one and redirected it down at Astral. the third one scored a solid 
hit causing a rupture in the back of his armor. he aimed his 
constrictor rifle up at Starlight and fired a beam that would knock 
the target out of the fight.

"You fools are nothing more than a design flaw, I am the advanced 
model on this world." He yells as the chase continued.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Astral/Fenox/Starlight/Recklessa::
> 
> Astral growls, firing two dozen more shots at Prebon. "Yes, and 
your 
> troops fell rather quickly."
> 
> He believed his troops were doing fine. The trainers were good, 
yes, 
> but his had only been warming up of course (or were they?).
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Fenox speeds up toward the falling bot, feeling Prebon's shots hit 
> her in the legs. She caught the new bot, flying off toward the Iron 
> Fist.
> 
> "Ha, try to catch me now!"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Starlight dodged the missile, firing three charges at Prebon as she 
> flew toward him. Out of the corner of her eyes, she saw Recklessa 
> climb out from the sea.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Prebon launches two missles the first intercepts Starlights 
charge 
> > and the second continues toward Starlight. Prebon speeds up his 
> > flight and flies in the direction of the falling bot. on the way 
he 
> > fires three more shots at Fenox. 
> > 
> > In an attempt at witty banter with Astral he keeps his comm 
> > open. "Troops are only as good as the bot in charge." He can't 
help 
> > to think how poorly these Alliance bots have performed in the 
> battle. 
> > if it wasn't for the main gun the Trainers would probably be 
> sitting 
> > in the command chair. "So far with what I know about your leader 
I 
> > fail to be surprised that you can't win."
